name: Scotch Hot Toddy
description: "I didn't invent this one," quips McCarthy. His version makes use of AnCnoc 12-year single malt, with a squirt of honey syrup (honey cut with hot water for smoother mixing), a wedge's squeeze of lemon, and to garnish, cinnamon, star anise, allspice berries, and a coin of orange peel studded with whole cloves.
recipeIngredient: Cinnamon stick, star anise, allspice berries, cloves, to garnish
1-inch round of orange peel, to garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Combine Scotch, honey syrup, and the juice of one lemon wedge in a glass. Add hot water. Garnish with one cinnamon stick, star anise, allspice berries, and one coin of orange peel studded with cloves.
